question: "Disko Island" is located in which country?
explanation: Disko Island is located in the Baffin Bay, off the west coast of Greenland which is an autonomous territory of Denmark. It is the second-largest island of Greenland and one of the hundred largest islands in the world. This island is separated from Nuussuaq Peninsula by the Sullorsuaq Strait. Disko Bay lies to the south of this island.
